metadata.title: CVE-2018-12178 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer overflow in network stack for EDK II may allow unprivileged user topotentially enable escalation of privilege and/or denial of service vianetwork.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12178` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 0~20180205.c0d9813c-2ubuntu0.2
qemu-efi - 0~20180205.c0d9813c-2ubuntu0.2
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 0~20180205.c0d9813c-2ubuntu0.2
qemu-efi-arm - 0~20180205.c0d9813c-2ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0~20180205.c0d9813c-2ubuntu0.2').
